Motion to:: Establish child-care center on Calvert road, allow city to enter partnership with UMD
Spend $60k of $80k in city’s Educational Improvement Fund to fund UMD's summer day camps; allocate remaining funds for grants to schools in line with Education Advisory Committee’s recommendations
Award a contract for the construction of a Duvall Field concession building and plaza
Send a letter to the Board of License Commissioners in support of UMD's proposed one-year trial period to sell beer and wine to patrons at athletic events
Authorize council support for legal document regarding freedom to marry that explains the harm marriage discrimination causes to families and communities, to be filed with the U.S. Supreme Court
Extend municipal voting rights to city residents who are non-U.S. citizens

Support the continuation of DACA by sending letter asking city’s state and federal representatives for their support of the continuation of the program

Adopt a resolution condemning the Trump administration’s ban on refugees immigrants from seven majority-Muslim countries

Increase the mayor’s annual salary to $10,500 and each council member’s annual salary to $7,000, effective Jan. 1, 2014. This represented a 40 percent increase

uthorize use of the City Hall parking lot for a College Park Farmer’s Market on Sundays

Authorize the City Manager to explore the installation and deployment of speed cameras in school zones
